welcome_message_body: Welcome to Petaluma! This charming city is known for its historic downtown, beautiful riverfront, and friendly locals. We hope you'll explore and enjoy all that Petaluma has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the private terminal at Napa County Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sonoma County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is primarily used for regional flights and is connected to the main terminal via a covered walkway.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
